root.name: Defy Gravity Extended
root.description: OverviewDefy Gravity Extended is a physics-based puzzle-platformer for Xbox Live Indie Game and PC via Steam; the game is developed by Fish Factory Games.GameplayDefy Gravity is an action platformer that mixes classic platforming with gravity-based puzzle solving. Very much like in Portal, the main character wields a unique weapon, only this one doesn't create portals out of thin air, but is instead able to manipulate the environment around her by altering the laws of physics-- that's right, the laws of physics. The player is able to spawn small pockets of gravity and anti-gravity that will in turn affect its surroundings, either by pulling object towards them (gravity) or pushing them away (anti-gravity). The player can and should also use these abilities to change the length of their jumps in order to overcome certain obstacles.PC System RequirementsOS: Windows XP/Vista/7Processor: 1.5GhzMemory: 512MbHard Disk Space: 50MbVideo Card: 128 MB Graphics Card that supports Shader Model 1.1DirectXÂ®: 9.0c
